title: Tool Use: Example

definitions.Language Model: A model that processes input to generate output.
definitions.Tool Augmented Language Model: A model that incorporates tool input to generate tool result before producing output.

formulas: task input text |tool-call tool input text |result tool output text
summary: The slide presents an example of a Tool Augmented Language Model, which integrates tool input to generate a tool result before producing the final output. It includes a diagram illustrating the process and examples of an abstract task and a weather task.
